CustomField.description: **System Calculated** Total of Gift In Kind Value + Net Asset Value. Provides a single column for reporting on the value of the non-cash gifts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** Total of Gift In Kind Value + Net Asset Value. Provides a single column for reporting on the value of the non-cash gifts. GIK_Value__c + Net_Asset_Value__c
CustomField.label: Calculated Value
